status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

fields.description: One of our customers has requested to introduce a feature/property which enables changing the bar color of Document Viewer. After discussing this with iOS team, it was decided that this can be done as a property and be a potential feature request.
fields.summary: iOS: Request to introduce a property to change the bar color in UIDocumentInteractionController/DocumentViewer
